ja521:5.1: tapokammaṁ → tape kammaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:7.1: tāta alakkhī ca → sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:9.1: tvaṁ sabbesu suhadayo → so tvaṁ sabbesaṁ suhadayo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); so tvaṁ sabbe suhadayo (mr)
ja521:12.3: Uṭṭhāhato → uṭṭhahato (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | appamajjato → mappamajjato (mr)
ja521:15.1: Sakkhisi tvaṁ → sakkhī tuvaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sakkhi tuvaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja521:26.5: Sīlavāssu → sīlavassu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sīlavāssa (ṭīkā)
ja521:27.1: Apucchimha kosiyagottaṁ → apucchimhā kosiyagottaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); apucchamhāpi kosikaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:27.3: Tvaṁ dāni vadehi jambuka → jambuka tvaṁdāni vadehi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:34.1: Paññāva sutaṁ vinicchinī → paññā sutavinicchinī (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja521:36.4: kammaphalaṁ tassijjhati → tamphalaṁ tassa ijjhati (bj); kammaphalaṁ tassa ijjhati (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed); phalaṁ tassa samijjhati (mr)
ja521:48.2: dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho → dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati (mr)
